variable.name: subid
variable.description: Child's project ID

variable.name: spq1
variable.description: Is considerate of other people's feelings

variable.name: spq2
variable.description: Is restless, overactive, cannot stay still for long

variable.name: spq3
variable.description: Often complains of headaches, stomach-aches or sickness

variable.name: spq4
variable.description: Shares readily with other children (treats, toys, pencils etc.)

variable.name: spq5
variable.description: Often has temper tantrums or hot tempers

variable.name: spq6
variable.description: Is rather solitary, tends to play alone

variable.name: spq7
variable.description: Is generally obedient, usually does what adults request

variable.name: spq8
variable.description: Has many worries, often seems worried

variable.name: spq9
variable.description: Is helpful if someone is hurt, upset or feeling ill

variable.name: spq10
variable.description: Is constantly fidgeting or squirming

variable.name: spq11
variable.description: Has at least one good friend

variable.name: spq12
variable.description: Often fights with other children or bullies them

variable.name: spq13
variable.description: Is often unhappy, down-hearted or tearful

variable.name: spq14
variable.description: Is generally liked by other children

variable.name: spq15
variable.description: Is easily distracted, concentration wanders

variable.name: spq16
variable.description: Is nervous or clingy in new situations, easily loses confidence

variable.name: spq17
variable.description: Is kind to younger children

variable.name: spq18
variable.description: Often lies or cheats

variable.name: spq19
variable.description: Is picked on or bullied by other children

variable.name: spq20
variable.description: Often volunteers to help others (parents, teachers, other children)

variable.name: spq21
variable.description: Thinks things out before acting

variable.name: spq22
variable.description: Steals from home, school or elsewhere

variable.name: spq23
variable.description: Gets along better with adults than with other children

variable.name: spq24
variable.description: Has many fears, is easily scared

variable.name: spq25
variable.description: Good attention span, sees chores or homework through to the end

variable.name: spq26
variable.description: Do you think that your child has difficulties in one or more of the following areas: emotions, concentration, behaviour or being able to get on with other people?

variable.name: spq27
variable.description: Do you think that your child has difficulties in one or more of the following areas: emotions, concentration, behaviour or being able to get on with other people? How long have these difficulties been present?

variable.name: spq28
variable.description: Do you think that your child has difficulties in one or more of the following areas: emotions, concentration, behaviour or being able to get on with other people? Do these difficulties upset or distress your child?

variable.name: spq29
variable.description: Do you think that your child has difficulties in one or more of the following areas: emotions, concentration, behaviour or being able to get on with other people? Do these difficulties interfere with your child's everyday life at home?

variable.name: spq30
variable.description: Do you think that your child has difficulties in one or more of the following areas: emotions, concentration, behaviour or being able to get on with other people? Do these difficulties interfere with your child's everyday life in friendships?

variable.name: spq31
variable.description: Do you think that your child has difficulties in one or more of the following areas: emotions, concentration, behaviour or being able to get on with other people? Do these difficulties interfere with your child's everyday life in classroom learning?

variable.name: spq32
variable.description: Do you think that your child has difficulties in one or more of the following areas: emotions, concentration, behaviour or being able to get on with other people? Do these difficulties interfere with your child's everyday life in leisure activities?

variable.name: spq33
variable.description: Do you think that your child has difficulties in one or more of the following areas: emotions, concentration, behaviour or being able to get on with other people? Do these difficulties put a burden on you or your family as a whole?
